title: 2.3 Master Challenge 2
question:
A game of shooting a basketball in the hoop is held between two teams. Each team has four players and each player gets five chances to shoot the ball. Every time a ball passes through the basket, the team scores a point. The team with the maximum points wins.
Write a program to find out which team wins the game.
1. Prompt the user to enter the points scored by each player in each team.
2. Using the boolean expression, compare the total points of each team to find which team wins the game.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
